name: 深色主题
style: QWidget { background-color: #1e1e1e; color: #e0e0e0; font-family: 'Microsoft YaHei', 'Segoe UI', sans-serif; } QMainWindow, QDialog { background-color: #1e1e1e; } QTabWidget::pane { border: 1px solid #444444; border-radius: 3px; } QTabBar::tab { background-color: #2d2d2d; color: #aaaaaa; min-width: 100px; padding: 8px 12px; border-top-left-radius: 4px; border-top-right-radius: 4px; } QTabBar::tab:selected, QTabBar::tab:hover { background-color: #3a3a3a; color: #ffffff; } QPushButton { background-color: #2979ff; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 4px; padding: 6px 12px; min-width: 80px; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #448aff; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #1565c0; } QPushButton:disabled { background-color: #555555; color: #aaaaaa; } QLineEdit, QComboBox, QSpinBox { background-color: #2d2d2d; color: #e0e0e0; border: 1px solid #444444; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px; } QComboBox::drop-down { border: none; background-color: #2979ff; width: 24px; } QToolBar { background-color: #2d2d2d; border-bottom: 1px solid #444444; } QStatusBar { background-color: #2d2d2d; color: #eeeeee; } QMenu { background-color: #2d2d2d; color: #e0e0e0; border: 1px solid #444444; } QMenu::item:selected { background-color: #3a3a3a; } QGroupBox { background-color: #2d2d2d; border: 1px solid #444444; border-radius: 4px; margin-top: 8px; font-weight: bold; } QGroupBox::title { color: #2979ff; subcontrol-origin: margin; subcontrol-position: top left; padding: 0 5px; } QScrollBar:vertical { background: #2d2d2d; width: 12px; margin: 0px; } QScrollBar::handle:vertical { background: #444444; min-height: 20px; border-radius: 6px; } QScrollBar::add-line:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical { border: none; background: none; } QScrollBar:horizontal { background: #2d2d2d; height: 12px; margin: 0px; } QScrollBar::handle:horizontal { background: #444444; min-width: 20px; border-radius: 6px; } QScrollBar::add-line:horizontal, QScrollBar::sub-line:horizontal { border: none; background: none; }
